dillon.gameAPI.gui

Class guiManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • dillon.gameAPI.gui.guiManager

  • public class guiManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is designed to show all of the gui set to display.
    Author:
    Dillon - Github dg092099

      • getDisplaying

        public static boolean getDisplaying()
        Returns if the manager is displaying something.
        Returns:
        if this is displaying something.

      • blackout

        public static void blackout(java.awt.Color bck,
            java.lang.String text,
            java.lang.String fontName,
            int fontSize,
            java.awt.Color fontColor)
        This blacks out the screen with many parameters. The text can be dismissed by using enter. The engine will not broadcast event ticks while this is active.
        Parameters:
        bck - The background color
        text - The text to display
        fontName - The name of the font to use.
        fontSize - The Size of the font to use.
        fontColor - The color of the text.

        Tells if there is a blackout.
        Returns:
        blackout

        Returns:

        Gets response from the user.
        Returns:
        The response.

      • blackout

        public static void blackout(java.awt.Image img)
        This does the same as the other blackout function however, you can specify your own image.
        Parameters:
        img - The image to display.

      • clearBlackout

        public static void clearBlackout()
        This cancels the blackout.

      • showDialog

        public static void showDialog(java.lang.String text,
              int size,
              java.awt.Color border)
        This will display a dialog on the screen for the user.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to display.
        size - The Font size to use.
        border - The color of the border that should be used.

      • showPrompt

              long LockId)
        Sets a dialog to be displayed.
        Parameters:
        text - The prompt.
        size - The size of the border.
        border - The color of the border.
